mapper.sql: cid, cname, cpicture, createtime, tid, cintroduce, cpingfen, cvideo
mapper.insert: insert into course (cid, cname, cpicture, createtime, tid, cintroduce, cpingfen, cvideo) values (#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cintroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpingfen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cvideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into course
cid,
cname,
cpicture,
createtime,
tid,
cintroduce,
cpingfen,
cvideo,

mapper.update:
update course
cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpicture = #{cpicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cintroduce = #{cintroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpingfen = #{cpingfen,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cvideo = #{cvideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
